creator: mk.mallick@nic.in
text:
When i  am configure Apachelenya RELEASE_2_0_RC_1 in Linux mechine useing ./configure.sh,i face problems 
      1.)org.apache.lenya.cms.workflow.usecase.Invokerworkflow class not found
      2.)some errors in Xml files 
            like ../src/targets/webapp-build.xml—Line no-174,
                  ../src/targets/modules-build.xml-Line no-74
                  ../build/lenya/temp/modules-build.xml-Line no-265

    Then  i Edit  local.build.properties
   from    modules.root.dirs=src/modules:src/modules-core:src/pubs/default/modules
                   to    modules.root.dirs=src/modules-core:src/modules:src/pubs/default/modules
                   
                                                                          from               
OTC,NIC,CHENNAI

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Would you mind trying a more recent release, e.g. 2.0.1 which is available via Subversion? Thanks!
